name: Squirreling Away
description:
Play as an escaped pet hamster stealing from their captors to start a revolution! Huzzah!

Controls:

WASD to move

Space to jump

E to push an item (let go of the item to finish the mission)

Made by (in alphabetical order):

Michael Ridgeway - Programming, Writing

Alec Tremblay - Programming, Art/Animation, Writing, Music

Dion Tryban - Lead Programmer
